## New York Proposal 1, Equal Protection of Law Amendment (2024)
## New York Proposal 1, Equal Protection of Law Amendment (2024)

,10.14254550612123,16.12332039414751,0.056910970956325746,0.02326064176832282,['New York Proposal 1, Equal Protection of Law Amendment (2024)']","['“This proposal would protect against unequal treatment based on ethnicity, national origin, age, disability, and sex, including sexual orientation, gender identity and pregnancy. It also protects against unequal treatment based on reproductive healthcare and autonomy.\nA YES vote puts these protections in the New York State Constitution.\nA NO vote leaves these protections out of the State Constitution.[7]”']","# Ballot for Albany County, New York
## New York Proposal 1, Equal Protection of Law Amendment (2024)

“This proposal would protect against unequal treatment based on ethnicity, national origin, age, disability, and sex, including sexual orientation, gender identity and pregnancy. It also protects against unequal treatment based on reproductive healthcare and autonomy.
A YES vote puts these protections in the New York State Constitution.
A NO vote leaves these protections out of the State Constitution.[7]”

# Ballot for Albany County, New York
## New York Proposal 1, Equal Protection of Law Amendment (2024)

“This proposal would protect against unequal treatment based on ethnicity, national origin, age, disability, and sex, including sexual orientation, gender identity and pregnancy. It also protects against unequal treatment based on reproductive healthcare and autonomy.
A YES vote puts these protections in the New York State Constitution.
A NO vote leaves these protections out of the State Constitution.[7]”
